title: When did i create my League of legends account
body: Would like to know when i created my account to prove friends wrong.

replies.body:
This is definitely not something we can divuldge on the boards, as that would make for terrible account security! 

You can visit the [privacy page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/) to see details about your account. Let me know if you have any questions.
